title: Introduction to C Programming
paragraph: Learn C programming fundamentals, syntax, and problem-solving skills for software development and system programming.

title: Introduction to Algorithms
paragraph: Comprehensive course covering fundamental algorithm design and analysis concepts for problem-solving in computer science.

title: Introduction to C++ for DSA
paragraph: C++ intro for DSA: Master C++ basics for adept problem-solving with data structures and algorithms, essential in programming.

title: Basic Data Structures
paragraph: Introductory course on fundamental data structure, arrays, linked lists and trees for efficient information management

title: Introduction to OOP Python
paragraph: Learn Python programming from scratch. Covers Python fundamentals, data structures, data science and machine learning all using Python

title: Software Engineering
paragraph: Learn software development methodologies, design principles, and project management for building efficient and reliable software systems.

title: AWS, Cloud Computing
paragraph: Explore AWS services, cloud infrastructure, and best practices for scalable and cost-effective cloud computing solutions.

title: Database (MySQL)
paragraph: Database (MySQL): MySQL is an open-source relational database management system widely used for storing and managing structured data.

title: Problem-Solving Part
paragraph: Code solving is problem-solving using programming, involving analysis, coding, testing, debugging, and optimization to craft effective and efficient solutions.
